hero.name: charlotte hayes
hero.title: principal architect
hero.description: I am a creative and dedicated architect, designing functional and inspiring spaces that blend aesthetics, sustainability, and practicality. My goal is to craft environments that leave a lasting impact and enhance everyday life.

items.name: Architectural Design
items.description: The creative process of conceptualizing, planning, and designing buildings that are both functional and visually compelling, tailored to client needs and site context.

items.name: Urban Planning
items.description: Strategic design and organization of urban spaces, infrastructure, and communities to create sustainable, livable, and efficient city environments.

items.name: Sustainable Design
items.description: Integrating eco-friendly principles, energy efficiency, and renewable materials to create buildings and spaces that minimize environmental impact while maximizing long-term performance.

items.name: Project Management
items.description: Overseeing all phases of design and construction projects, from budgeting and scheduling to coordination and delivery, ensuring timely and successful outcomes.

items.name: 3d Visualization
items.description: Creating photorealistic 3D renderings and virtual walkthroughs to help clients visualize and refine designs before construction begins.

items.name: Documentation
items.description: Preparing detailed technical drawings, specifications, and construction documents essential for permitting, bidding, and building execution.

items.name: Feasibility Studies
items.description: In-depth analysis of site potential, regulatory constraints, budget, and program requirements to determine project viability and guide informed decision-making.

work_experience.location: Visionary Designs Studio – New York, NY
work_experience.description: Designed seasonal menus featuring innovative and locally sourced ingredients. Led a team of 15 kitchen staff, ensuring seamless operations during peak hours.

work_experience.location: Urban Sphere Architects – Los Angeles, CA
work_experience.description: Designed seasonal menus featuring innovative and locally sourced ingredients. Led a team of 15 kitchen staff, ensuring seamless operations during peak hours.
